column1: '''Twilight''' was the soft light in the sky seen before the rising and (especially) after the setting of the [[Sun]].
In [[Sindarin]] it is ''[[uial]]'' or ''[[tinnu]]''. There are several words for it in [[Quenya]]
column4: and ''[[lómë]]''.  Morning twilight is also designated in Quenya: the name ''[[tindómë]]''; and the evening twilight
